name: Pulse for Elasticsearch and OpenSearch
description: Pulse makes it easy to control the cost and performance of your Elasticsearch & OpenSearch clusters. Get comprehensive cluster health assessments, actionable maintenance insights, automated root cause analysis and more.
label: Search Cluster Monitoring & Maintenance, Redefined

name: Effie
description: Effie is your writing companion to unleash your creativity. With a simple interface, 1000+ inspirational prompts, and AI-powered templates, Effie helps you get into flow state effortlessly. Cross-device syncing keeps your ideas with you, even offline.
label: Effortless Writing, Endless Inspiration

name: Zopdev
description: Zopdev is a pre-engineered DevOps platform to manage all your cloud accounts in a unified platform. It automates cloud infra management by optimising resource allocation, preventing downtime, streamlining deployments, and enabling seamless scaling across CSPs
label: Production Ready & Compliant Infra in 30 Minutes

name: Solver
description: Solver is an autonomous coding agent that completes software tasks on its own. Give it work, walk away, and return to finished code ready for review. It operates directly in your git repositories, handling everything from bug fixes to new features.
label: Offload coding tasks to AI while you tackle bigger problems

name: Tiptap AI Suggestion
description: Easily integrate secure, customizable AI-driven suggestions into your Tiptap editor. Define custom rules globally or per document and integrate your own AI models. Flexible enough for proofreading, compliance, brand voice, style guides, and more.

name: RiseON

RiseON is an Multi Agent AI all-in-one platform packed with tools to elevate your career.
Your ultimate companion to assist in every step of your career. Build an Interactive Resume Website and experience mock interviews, job boards, career guidance and more.
label: Your Career Companion

name: Kommunicate
description: Instantly train and connect your inbox with Kommunicate AI to start resolving repetitive email queries. Use AI to assign, escalate, and deflect tickets, allowing you to focus on complex queries that require human understanding and empathy.
label: Resolve incoming email queries effortlessly with AI

description: Claude.ai's analysis tool runs JavaScript for data analysis, processing CSV files for accurate, actionable insights, helping teams in marketing, sales, product, and finance optimize decisions and performance.
